channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: The real-life dog behind memecoin DOGE is seriously ill
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The owner of the internet-famous Shiba Inu dog posted on social media saying Kabosu is in a "dangerous position" after falling ill on Christmas Eve.

item.title: Fidelity plans NFT marketplace and financial services in the Metaverse
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Newly filed trademark applications outline a long list of possible avenues for the firm in the Metaverse.

item.title: Robocallers have upped their scam game and they’re after your crypto
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Sophisticated malicious outfits are keeping up with current trends, turning their sights on crypto users following the bankruptcy of FTX.

item.title: Near Project’s Octopus Network lays off 40% of its staff amid crypto winter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The remaining workforce is also expected to take 20% pay cuts, the project's founder said.

item.title: BitKeep exploiter used phishing sites to lure in users: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The attacker appears to be attempting to cash out funds using Binance and Changenow.

item.title: Krampus is coming to the crypto space this holiday season
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Not even major exchanges collapsing can deter crypto users from believing in the space year after year.

item.title: SBF stays at parents’ house on a $250 million bail: Law Decoded, Dec. 19-26
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: A bail was granted to SBF on the conditions of a $250 million bond, home detention, location monitoring and the surrender of his passport.

item.title: Price analysis 12/26: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, MATIC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: The S&P 500 may try to move up in the short term and that could trigger a recovery in Bitcoin and select altcoins.

item.title: Project Hamilton has concluded, weeks after legislators’ enquiry, according to Boston Fed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The two-year project produced a white paper in February. Research results will continue to appear, with the Fed’s partner at MIT scheduled to make a research report in January.

item.title: What are proof-of-reserves audits, and how do they work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: Crypto custodians generate public attestations about their cryptocurrency holdings through proof-of-reserves audits to demonstrate their solvency to depositors.

item.title: 7 biggest crypto collapses of 2022 the industry would like to forget
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: A look at some of the biggest disappointments in the crypto space from this year as the industry readies itself for better things to come.

item.title: Andre Cronje says Fantom will focus on DApp ecosystem expansion in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Fantom previously pledged to cut its token burn rate by 75% to incentivize decentralized application development.

item.title: Bitcoin price volatility due within days, new take says as BTC flatlines at $16.8K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin hodlers may not have much longer to wait before BTC price action gets interesting again.

item.title: Bitcoin accumulation addresses near record 800K despite whale selling
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Someone has been accumulating BTC throughout the 2022 Bitcoin bear market, and the trend shows no sign of reversing.

item.title: Defrost v1 hacker reportedly returns funds as ‘exit scam’ allegations surface
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “Merry Christmas guys. We got a lump of coal from Santa Claus,” wrote one user in response to the allegations and the incident.

item.title: Bitcoin mining pool BTC.com reports $3M cyberattack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: BTC.com, the seventh-largest Bitcoin mining pool, said that its client fund services were unaffected by the recent $3 million cyberattack.

item.title: Italy to create the crypto art Renaissance: NFT market report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Research and Market’s latest NFT market report for Italy predicts a 47.6% growth in the country’s NFT market by the end of 2022.

item.title: Crypto community expresses Christmas market sentiments: ‘No Santa rally’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: A community member pointed out that the lack of movements may be because of the controversies surrounding centralized exchanges.

item.title: Japan to lift the ban on foreign stablecoins like USDT in 2023: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: None of the 31 crypto exchanges registered with Japan's Financial Services Agency are currently offering trading in stablecoins like USDT or USDC.

item.title: FTX collapse calls for ‘prudent regulation’ in the UK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The United Kingdom is taking cautionary lessons from the collapse of FTX as calls for greater regulation come from public and private sector institutions.

item.title: Bitcoin exchange withdrawals sink to 7-month low as users forget FTX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin exchange users get comfortable as “Do Nothing December” sees BTC price volatility drop to record lows.

item.title: ETH staking on top exchanges contributes to Ethereum censorship: Data
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: One of the biggest factors harming Ethereum’s credible neutrality is the use of censoring MEV relays by crypto ecosystems and exchanges.

item.title: Hackers drain $8M in assets from Bitkeep wallets in latest DeFi exploit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The BitKeep team confirmed that some APK package downloads have been hijacked by attackers and installed by users.

item.title: SEC seeks to keep Hinman documents hidden in Ripple case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: SEC’s request to seal documents in the Ripple Labs case has sparked criticism from the community.

item.title: 4 ‘emerging narratives’ in crypto to watch for: Trading firm
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The crypto trading firm sees NFTs becoming more intertwined with brand IP, while Web3 apps with “real world utility” gain traction.

item.title: Nifty News: Square Enix invests into NFT gaming firm, Beeple speaks on NFT art future and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: Pokémon Company International has taken an Australian company to court over advertising an unlicensed NFT-based Pokémon game and HSBC has filed for a host of NFT and Metaverse trademarks.

item.title: North Korean hackers stealing NFTs using nearly 500 phishing domains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: The hackers created decoy websites impersonating NFT marketplaces, NFT projects and even a DeFi platform.

item.title: 400M Twitter users’ data is reportedly on sale in the black market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The private contact information of Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin, shark tank host Kevin O'Leary and Mark Cuban are among those purportedly for sale.

item.title: Bitcoin hashrate recovers after big freeze shuts down miners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The Bitcoin network hashrate has returned to 241.29 EH/s after a temporary 38% fall to 170.60 EH/s from a weekly peak of 276.40 EH/s.

item.title: Women who made a contribution to the crypto industry in 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Elizabeth Gail
item.description: 2022 saw greater inclusivity and participation of women in the crypto and blockchain industries.
